function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Preliminary tests for kmo and bartlett tests","category":"Person","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of common opinion on variables for calculating the soundness of banks","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Direct impact of banks’ financial performance on their soundness","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of statistical techniques for categorizing banks based on creditworthiness","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate credit guarantee ratio in a recession","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data for all asean member states","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Novelty of the study","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Risk of financial default","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex model formulation","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Empirical study based on theoretical model","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex loan demand equations may lead to incorrect loan assessments and allocations.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate equilibrium loan amount calculations may result in under or over-financing of small and medium enterprises smes .","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-optimal credit guarantee ratio determination may increase the risk of loan default and financial losses.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete understanding of optimal credit guarantee ratio in the banking industry for sme loans in asean countries during and after covid-19 crisis","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Moral hazard resulting from adopting the same credit guarantee ratio for all banks","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete modeling of the credit guarantee ratio may lead to suboptimal policy decisions","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of appropriate lending technology for credit-rationed smes","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of academic study on the impact of covid-19 on asean economies","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on smes in asean countries","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear legal basis for pseudonymization conversions","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal resource reliance in federated approaches","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of local support for legal and informatics aspects","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stringent local legal and ethical requirements hindering timely research in public health threats","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and harmonization in covid-19 patient cohorts","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sensitive participant-level clinical data usage and privacy concerns","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Competitive nature of funding calls overlooks certain eu regions, leading to limited participation from those areas.","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ethical considerations in accessing patient records","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardized reporting for cohort data and international code linkage","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enrollment of over 1,300,000 individuals in the orchestra cohort","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for future strategies for largescale harmonisation of individual data","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suboptimal data science literacy in the health sector","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of regulatory frameworks for data protection","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"General lack of consensus in the interpretation of the general data protection regulation gdpr","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharing of highly sensitive health data","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of neighborhood social capital limits access to healthcare and information, contributing to disease factors and exacerbating stress.","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discovery of virus with genomic similarity to sars-cov-2 raises concerns about potential for human transmission.","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher disease burden in specific subsets of urban populations in the global south","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial segregation of socioeconomic groups leading to disproportionate exposure to environmental toxins and pollutants","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neighborhood-scale inequities in access to social resources leading to health community volunteers for disaster response","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transfer of surveillance data management to a u.s. consultancy","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adaptive governance leading to ineffective response to the pandemic","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weak social capital and lack of trust in the community","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate decentralization of control in healthcare planning","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"}]}
